mapper.insert: insert into product (product_no, user_no, market_no, category_no, product_name, product_qn, product_price) values(product_seq.nextval,#{userNo},#{marketNo},#{categoryNo},#{productName},#{productQn},#{productPrice})
mapper.select: select user_name from myuser where user_no = #{userNo}

select product_no as productNo, market_no as marketNo, product_name as productName, product_price as productPrice, product_content as productContent
from product where product_no>=0 order by product_no desc
select * from product where writer like '%' || #{productName} || '%'
